name: @hola-ui/nuxt
description: Nuxt 3 compatible version of Hola UI Vue
author: albert trantoan.fox.97@gmail.com

scripts.build:esm: cross-env BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts -d dist/esm --source-maps
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts -d dist/cjs --source-maps
scripts.watch:esm: cross-env BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts -d dist/esm --source-maps --watch
scripts.watch:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .ts -d dist/cjs --source-maps --watch
